attackStats.name: LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hero-of-the-flora.png} tip={Hero of the Flora (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/flare.png} tip={Flare (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-mastery.png} tip={Chakram Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/intuition.png} tip={Intuition (3rd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-expert.png} tip={Chakram Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/magic-conversion.png} tip={Magic Conversion (Beginner Skill)} val={50% of Magic Attack from equipment - excluding weapon} val={Cannot exceed 20% of weapon's base Magic Attack}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+100 & 100% of Magic Attack from equipment - excluding weapon} val={Cannot exceed 150% of weapon's base Magic Attack}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/impulse.png} tip={Impulse (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-expert.png} tip={Chakram Expert (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/innate-gift.png} tip={Innate Gift (Link Skill)} val={+5%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/flora/khali/divine-wrath.png} tip={Divine Wrath (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/conversion-overdrive.png} tip={Conversion Overdrive (5th Job)} val={up to +45%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/intuition.png} tip={Intuition (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/redemption.png} tip={Redemption (4th Job)} val={+40%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+10% in Stage 1} val={+24% in Stage 2}>

attackStats.name: Ignore DEF
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/intuition.png} tip={Intuition (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/flora/khali/redemption.png} tip={Redemption (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)} dur={[30s, Max 6 Chakri](Toggle)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/death-blossom.png} tip={Death Blossom (Hyper Skill)} dur={[30s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-pandemonium.png} tip={Hex: Pandemonium (5th Job)} dur={[3s](30s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/desert-veil.png} tip={Desert Veil (4th Job)} dur={[3s](75s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/oblivion.png} tip={Oblivion (Hyper Skill)} dur={[30s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/divine-wrath.png} tip={Divine Wrath (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate-ultimatum.png} tip={Resonate: Ultimatum (5th Job)} dur={[30s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} dur={[30s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/conversion-overdrive.png} tip={Conversion Overdrive (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/desert-veil.png} tip={Desert Veil (4th Job)} dur={[3s](75s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-burst.png} tip={Void Burst (5th Job)} dur={[4.3s during skill, 3.5s after skill](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-sandstorm.png} tip={Hex: Sandstorm (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>

linkSkill.name: Innate Gift
linkSkill.shortDesc: Damage: +5%\nUpon attacking, Recovery Chance: 100%, Recovery 2% of Max HP/MP per sec, Duration: 5 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec.
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets, cooldown reduction, and buff duration increase

build: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/spark.png} tip={Spark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/flare.png} tip={Flare}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/patience.png} tip={Patience}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-cross-cut.png} tip={Arts: Cross Cut}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/impulse.png} tip={Impulse}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-mastery.png} tip={Chakram Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-booster.png} tip={Chakram Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-dual-edge.png} tip={Arts: Dual Edge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/insanity-i.png} tip={Insanity I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-crescentum.png} tip={Arts: Crescentum}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/insanity-ii.png} tip={Insanity II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/vigilance.png} tip={Vigilance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/intuition.png} tip={Intuition}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/deceiving-blade.png} tip={Deceiving Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-triple-bash.png} tip={Arts: Triple Bash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-chakram-sweep.png} tip={Hex: Chakram Sweep}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/insanity-iii.png} tip={Insanity III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/redemption.png} tip={Redemption}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/ascend.png} tip={Ascend}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/chakram-expert.png} tip={Chakram Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-flurry.png} tip={Arts: Flurry}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hero-of-the-flora.png} tip={Hero of the Flora}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-chakram-split.png} tip={Hex: Chakram Split}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-chakram-fury.png} tip={Hex: Chakram Fury}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/desert-veil.png} tip={Desert Veil}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/floran-heros-will.png} tip={Floran Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-reinforce.png} tip={Hex - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-guardbreak.png} tip={Hex - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-boss-rush.png} tip={Hex - Boss Rush}> Hex - Reinforce, Guardbreak, and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-extra-strike.png} tip={Arts - Extra Strike}> Arts - Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-reinforce.png} tip={Void - Reinforce}> Void - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-flurry.png} tip={Arts: Flurry / Crescentum (4th Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-chakram-sweep.png} tip={Hex: Chakram Sweep / Chakram Split / Chakram Fury (3rd Job / 4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate / Deceiving Blade (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/death-blossom.png} tip={Death Blossom (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-cross-cut.png} tip={Arts: Cross Cut (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-dual-edge.png} tip={Arts: Dual Edge (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-triple-bash.png} tip={Arts: Triple Bash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate / Deceiving Blade (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/hex-chakram-sweep.png} tip={Hex: Chakram Sweep / Chakram Split / Chakram Fury (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-flurry.png} tip={Arts: Flurry / Crescentum (4th Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/death-blossom.png} tip={Death Blossom (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Khali Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Arts, Void, and Hex Skills
content: Arts Skills are direct attacks that utilize your Chakram weapon. Pre-5th Job Arts Skills reduce the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> Void Rush (1st Job) and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}> Void Blitz (4th Job)

Void Skills are primarily utility skills that can leave afterimages that damage enemies. Certain skills when used provide <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state (Rush and Blitz) or invincibility (Burst)
In 3rd Job, Void Skills have a chance to create <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri that interact with Hex Skills

Hex Skills are powerful Chakram attacks with cooldowns that deal a special or wide-range attack. In 3rd Job, Hex Skills also interact with created <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri to create flying projectiles called <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate (3rd Job)}> Resonate
<em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

Starting 2nd Job, using <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> Void Rush grants <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Reminiscence
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Move back to Erimos.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 50% of your equipment's Magic ATT is converted to Attack Power, excluding your weapon.\nAny set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 20% of your weapon's base Attack Power.

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete Khali's storyline and the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/245/Ypsilon%27s_Identity} title={"Ypsilon's Identity"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Arts: Cross Cut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 3\nReduces cooldown of Void Rush/Void Blitz by 1 sec when the attack hits.
details: Successful attacks decrease the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Spark
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Void Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Move quickly in the direction pressed\nCooldown: 5 sec
details: Pressing the Left/Right Arrow Key and Skill Key together will dash in the given direction
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Flare
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Defense: +150, Max HP: +500, Max MP: +500, and Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Patience
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20, Avoidability: +30%

primary.name: Arts: Dual Edge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4\nReduces cooldown of Void Rush/Void Blitz by 1 sec when the attack hits.
primary.desc: Slash forward twice with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks decrease the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Arts: Crescentum
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 4\nVoid Rush/Void Blitz Cooldown: -5 sec.\nCooldown: 5 sec
details: Can only be used during or after a Void Skill to attack in the direction of the skill

When used, immediately decreases the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Chakram Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration: 200 sec, Chakram Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Chakram Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Chakram Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30

primary.name: Insanity I
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30, Move quickly in the direction pressed, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 2
Normal Enemy Damage: +180% points
Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec
Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Enhances <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}>, granting the ability to dash in 8 directions and now damages enemies in your path
details: When used, briefly enters <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state and hover while in the air
While dashing, pressing the Jump Key will immediately stop the dash
Can be used while casting Arts and Hex Skills
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amount
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets

primary.name: Impulse
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +35%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: LUK +60

primary.name: Arts: Triple Bash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 5\nReduces cooldown of Void Rush/Void Blitz by 1 sec when the attack hits.
primary.desc: Slash forward several times with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks decrease the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Large Chakram Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 7\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Throw forward a giant chakram that damages and pushes enemies in its path

primary.name: Summon Chakri
primary.shortDesc: 30% chance to create Chakri when defeating monsters or attacking Boss monsters with Void-type skills.\n100% chance to create chakri when canceling Arts/Hex-type skills with Void-type skills.\nChakri Duration: 30 sec, Max Created: 6, Not created near locations that already have chakri.
primary.desc: While toggled, defeating enemies with a Void Skill or attacking bosses have a chance to create a Chakri (up to 6)
details: Chakri are used to activate damaging projectiles from <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate (3rd Job)}>
Upon cancelling a Arts/Hex Skill using a Void Skill, a Chakri will be created
Adding Skill Points (SP) into <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate.png} tip={Resonate (3rd Job)}> will automatically grant this skill

primary.name: Resonate
primary.shortDesc: Using Hex-type skills manifest chakri summoned within a certain range with Resonate.\nManifested Resonate deal 165% damage 3 times then disappears after bouncing to up to 3 times.\nRepeatedly hitting a single target reduces Final Damage by 45%.
primary.desc: Using a Hex Skill converts nearby <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri into damaging homing projectiles
details: The projectiles can attack several times before disappearing<bp_Damaging the same enemy will deal reduced %Final Damage after the first hit_>
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Insanity II
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Move quickly in the direction pressed, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3
Normal Monster Damage: +210%p
Dark Sight for 2 sec. when used
Max Consecutive Uses: 2
Cooldown: 5 sec.
details: Increases attack's range and can be linked with a Hex Skill
Increases attack's %Damage and Number of Attacks, %Damage (by a flat amount) to regular monsters

Can be used 2 times in quick succession before the cooldown is applied<bp_Using any skill other than <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/spark.png} tip={Spark (1st Job)}>, <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-crescentum.png} tip={Arts: Crescentum (2nd Job)}>, and Hex Skills will interrupt the quick succession_Linking with <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-crescentum.png} tip={Arts: Crescentum (2nd Job)}> can allow up to 4 dashes (or 6 in 4th Job)_Linking Void->Hex->Void is possible, but Void->Arts (except <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/arts-crescentum.png} tip={Arts: Crescentum (2nd Job)}>)->Void is impossible_>
While in the air, the skill can only be used to dash upwards up to 2 times regardless of cooldown
While casting, pressing the Skill Key again will buffer the next dash

primary.name: Void Enhance
primary.shortDesc: Increased the movement range of Void Rush.
details: Adding Skill Points (SP) into <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/insanity-ii.png} tip={Insanity II (3rd Job)}> will automatically grant this skill

primary.name: Deceiving Blade
primary.shortDesc: When Void-type skills hit, Buff Duration: 20 sec\nWhen direct attacks hit while buff is active, Extra Hit Damage: 370%, Number of Extra Attacks: 2\nExtra Hit Cooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: Upon successful Void Skill attacks, grants a short buff that provides an additional attack on successful Arts/Hex attacks
details: Additional attack will not trigger from Void skills, projectiles, and summons
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and buff duration increase

primary.name: Intuition
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Ignore DEF: +20%, Attack Power: +30\nArts: Crescentum Damage: +120%p

primary.name: Vigilance
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +15%, Max MP: +15%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%, Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Arts: Flurry
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 290%, Number of Attacks: 7\nReduces cooldown of Void Rush/Void Blitz by 1 sec when the attack hits.
primary.desc: Slash forward in a flurry with your chakrams
details: Successful attacks decrease the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Split
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 245%, Number of Attacks: 5, Large Chakram Thrown: 4\nEach chakram hits the target up to 4 times.\nCooldown: 14 sec.
primary.desc: Throw forward several chakrams that spin briefly before returning to your position
details: Chakrams damage enemies during its path and while spinning
While returning, chakrams will disappear if you move too far
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hex: Chakram Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 10\nCooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: Unleash a storm of chakrams around you
details: When used in the air, you will float
While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Void Blitz
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 4, Aftertime Activations: 4\nDark Sight Duration: 2 sec\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Release several afterimages forward that damage enemies it passes through
details: When used, briefly enters <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> Dark Sight state
Each afterimage is considered a separate attack and the effect of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> is applied to each individually
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF to activate this skill when using <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> without any Arrow Keys pressed
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Desert Veil
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Invincibility Duration: 3 sec\nCooldown: 75 sec
details: While active, only the following skills can be used: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/spark.png} tip={Spark (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}>
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the buff early
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, creates a Flora emblem\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Insanity III
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Move quickly in the direction pressed, Max enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 4
Normal Enemy Damage: +350% points
Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec
Max Consecutive Uses: 3
Cooldown: 5 sec
details: Increases attack's %Damage, Number of Attacks, Max Enemies Hit, and %Damage (by a flat amount) to regular monsters
Can be used 3 times in quick succession

primary.name: Chakram Expert
primary.shortDesc: Chakram Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Ascend
primary.shortDesc:
Resonate Damage: +200%p
Number of Resonate Bounces: +1
Summon Chakri Creation Chance: +45%
Hex: Chakram Sweep Damage: +400% points
Arts: Crescentum Damage: +130% points
details: Does not apply to <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate-ultimatum.png} tip={Resonate: Ultimatum (5th Job)}>

primary.name: Redemption
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +40%, Ignore Defense: +20%, Boss Damage: 30%

hyperPassive.name: Hex - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Hex Skills

hyperPassive.name: Hex - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of all Hex Skills

hyperPassive.name: Hex - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of all Hex Skills

hyperPassive.name: Resonate - Range
details: Does not apply to <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/resonate-ultimatum.png} tip={Resonate: Ultimatum (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Void - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Void Skills

hyperPassive.name: Void - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of all Void Skills

hyperPassive.name: Arts - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Arts Skills

hyperPassive.name: Arts - Spread
details: Increases Max Enemies Hit of all Arts Skills

hyperPassive.name: Arts - Extra Strike
details: Increases Number of Attacks of all Arts Skills

hyperActive.name: Oblivion
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, Duration: 30 sec
Resets cooldown of Void Rush and Void Blitz upon use.
While active, reduces cooldown of 4th job or below Hex-type skills by 50%.
Void/Hex-type Skills Final Damage: +30%
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Upon use, grants a buff and resets the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-rush.png} tip={Void Rush (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/void-blitz.png} tip={Void Blitz (4th Job)}>
details: [Buff]: Increases the %Final Damage of Void/Hex Skills and reduces the cooldown of 4th job and below Hex Skills by 50%

hyperActive.name: Death Blossom
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Summon Duration: 30 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 6
100% chance to create summoned chakri in the location of the attack
If the total target attacked is lower than the max, additional summoned chakri as much as the difference are created in random locations.
Up to 2 additional summoned chakri are created. It cannot be created near locations that already have a chakri.
Cooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Place down a stationary blossom that periodically attacks nearby enemies
details: For each enemy hit, <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri are created (max. 2 per enemy)<bp_If the number of enemies hit are less than the Max Enemies Hit, an additional <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri is created_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Flora class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Hex: Pandemonium
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 700, Duration: 3 sec, Summons the realm of chaos, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 715%, Number of Attacks: 4
Attack Speed increases in proportion to the realm of chaos duration, can increase up to +3.
When duration ends, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1375%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Explosions: 5
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a chakram storm that continuously damages enemies within it
details: The storm gains increasing attack speed based on the duration of the attack
At the end of the attack, the storm explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Void Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Wind of Vengeance Descent Duration: 4.3, Invincible during Wind of Vengeance
Using the skill again during Wind of Vengeance pursues a target in the surroundings, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2200%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 12
5 consecutive attacks or duration ends, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2310%, Number of Attacks: 15, Chase Cut: 6, Invincibility Duration: 3.5 sec
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, grants invincibility for the duration of the skill however, you cannot perform any actions
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key (up to 5 times) activates consecutive slash attacks that prioritize bosses with the highest HP first<bp_If no enemies are in range, the slashes activate on the player's location_>
After the 5 consecutive attacks or when the duration ends, a finishing blow is activated that grants invincibility briefly
The consecutive slashes and finishing blow can create <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Arts: Astra
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ancient Chakram Summoned: 3\nDisappears after a while, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 14 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, upon successful Arts Skill attacks, chakrams appear above enemies and slash down upon them
details: Chakrams will remain briefly after striking, dealing continuous damage before disappearing
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Resonate: Ultimatum
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec
Max Awakened Chakri Created: 8
Using Hex-type skills splits and manifests the summoned Awakened Chakri within a certain range up to 2 Resonates.
Awakened Resonate deals 315% damage 3 times, bounces up to 4 times and then disappears
Normal Enemy Damage: + 150% points
When repeatedly hitting a single target, Final Damage: -45%
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhanced <tt src={/class-icons/flora/khali/summon-chakri.png} tip={Summon Chakri (3rd Job)}> Chakri can be created (up to 8) that Hex Skills activate into 2 enhanced Resonates
details: The projectiles can attack several times before disappearing<bp_Damaging the same enemy will deal reduced %Final Damage after the first hit_>
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amount
Attack prioritizes bosses with highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

MP Cost: 62, Move quickly in the direction pressed, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 370%, Number of Attacks: 4
Normal Enemy Damage: +585%p
Dark Sight Duration: 2 sec
Max Consecutive Uses: 3
Cooldown: 5 sec

100% chance to create summoned chakri in the location of the attack
If  the total target attacked is lower than the max, additional summoned chakri as much as the difference are created in random locations.
Up to 2 additional summoned chakri are created. It cannot be created near locations that already have a chakri.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Resonate
masteryCore.shortDesc: Hex-type skills manifest chakri summoned within a certain range with Resonate.\nManifested Resonate deals 550% damage 3 times, then disappears after bouncing up to 4 times.\nAdditional Resonate Created When Manifesting Chakri 15 times: 10 Repeatedly hitting single target reduces Final Damage by 45%.
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Deceiving Blade
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Void-type skills hit, Buff Duration: 20 sec.\nWhen direct attacks hit while buff is active, Extra Hit Damage: 610%, Number of Extra Attacks: 2\nExtra Hit Cooldown: 0.5 sec.
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Hex: Sandstorm
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Hold down the key for max 3 sec to create a chakram storm, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 770%, Number of Attacks: 15
When the key is released - Chase Cuts Created: 13, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 830%, Number of Attacks: 10. Then a powerful sandstorm is created, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 820%, Number of Attacks: 14, Explosions: 34
Final Damage: +25% for 30 sec
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Khali is LUK thief class part of the Flora class group. Khali utilize Chakrams as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Khali can equip Hex Seekers
